Package com.salami.awkward.mobile.control.experiment

Interface Summary
Entity Basic entity within the game.
IControlScheme Basic interface detailing the different control schemes that are available for the game
 

Class Summary
AboutActivity Activity that gives basic details about AS.G
AsgmobilecontrolexperimentActivity The main control selection screen that allows the player the start a play through with the selected control scheme
Coin The collectible item for the game.
Ground Wrapper around body with a display image for a piece of wall
Hero The main player entity that wraps functionality for movement and jumping
MCEContactListener This maps Box2D collision callbacks to the entities involved and calls the appropriate callbacks in the entity.
MCEGameActivity The main activity for the game.
SegmentedControlScheme Control Scheme that is divides the screen into left/right half touching the left moves the player left and similar for right touching both causes the player to jump
ServerControlsTest Control scheme to test the tracking system Starts tracking on touch down and ends on touch up
Splash A activity that comes up when the app is launched and shows a splashscreen
TiltControlScheme A control scheme based on tilting the device to move and tapping the screen to jump
VirtualControlScheme A control scheme that mimicks a real joystick and button
 

Enum Summary
Entity.EntityType  
IControlScheme.ControlType  
SegmentedControlScheme.Direction
